participants.name: John Pittas
participants.description: Electronics Technician at Progeny Systems Inc
participants.url: Geek Squad Consulting Agent at Best Buy

messages.message:
hey dude, do you remember hyrum and kyra??? i mean im not to sure but i believe that was there names, last name gambi i think.  what ever happened to them?

remember sage lol, he turned into a trannie lol.  he found me when myspace was the thing.

Brian
lol, that amazing.  Yeah sometimes i reminisce.  I wonder if they are on facebook.
How's life?  We haven't caught up in a while, what have you been up to?

learnin and such. i actually have 2 associates degrees, poly sci and sociology.  trying to figure out what i want to do but im not in any hurry to do so.  prolly going to go off to school for philosophy but even though we may have graduated 4 years ago... i still will be in school at least another 4 years lol.  i dont mind though, i like school. figure if i stop now, ill never go back so might as well keep going.  you can never know to much, ya know.

what about you dude, haven't seen or heard from you since we went paintballing for your birthday in 9th grade, lol.

Brian
Hey did you ever find Hyrum on FB?
We should get the old group back together some time.
or Kayla?
I was so mean to her, I use to call her Gayla
I think you started that.
Or umm..  Sage?
That was his name right?
that was not me and last i heard sage (goes by marpa last i checked) was in LA i think. he has a myspace, witchmarpa is the user i believe

Brian
I felt so bad for him being tossed around and living with a couple falling apart.

and nah, i never found them which is a bummer.
yeah, he had a rough few years

Brian
what was his last name?
or his sisters name?
nah, it was his actual first name

Brian
no, what is his last name?
I am pretty sure his sister wanted my virginity.
 mistakes
I would have been so much cooler in high school
lol
oh hyrum? thought we were talking about sage. Ghambi i  think, hyrum and kyra gambi

Brian
oh yeah totall
or something like that.

Brian
y
sorry I switch topics a lot
and yeah, i think she did too.

Brian
no way

Brian
https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100000017650628&sk=photos
is that him on the left
?
could be haha, cant tell

Brian
so what's new?
loads dude, we havent talked in 10 years haha

Brian
nah, it's been less than that.  we've talked on facebook before.
where are you now?
DC at the moment

Brian
oh nice!
business or pleasure?
where are you working?

Thats where i live and go to school.
manager at office depot by day, studying philosophy/psychology by night.

Brian
oh cool, how far in to it are you?
didnt focus on a degree till 2009 haha, i have 2 associates degrees because i stayed in CC because i had no idea what i wanted to do with my life or what i wanted to really learn.

Brian
oh.
i have no problems still going to school

Brian
yeah for sure
school is fun
make plenty more money than i spend and am taking a full load at GMU

Brian
nice
what about you man, where have you been?

Brian
I am working in phoenix
for a midical device startup
doing programming

nice, well done
i started building computers

Brian
oh cool
it's the future man
lol

i just realized that if i constantly swap out parts for better parts, but keep the old ones i can sell off a complete computer of old parts and make all my money back. haha. Comp i have right now was roughly free

Brian
yes!  awesome
and god bless the suckers that buy old shit for lots of money
hahaha
well, my old shit is like at most a year, year and a half old so its still i sweet rig... just slightly marked up to pay for all the new parts

Brian
yeah definitely
good business to be in, it is growing a lot even in this economy
just waiting on AMDs bulldozer and ill be able to sell off another one

Brian
yeah definitely
8 core chip?
will be nice
yeah, the one that actually broke the overclocking record at 8.9 GHz

Brian
yeah
8.49 im sorry

Brian
I need upgrades
whats holding you back man, new egg always has deals

Brian
meh.  money.
I am paying a lot on living
and running servers is expensive.
i hear ya.

any luck getting a hold of the gambee croud?
crowd*
beer and spelling do not mix

Brian
nope

Brian
You should friend Hyrum
that was totally him
https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100001891587118
he's only in vegas, I am there like twice a year.
